title: Flipbook Textures
description: The flipbook_textures.json file defines animated textures for blocks. Each entry specifies a texture that cycles through frames at a specified rate. Located at textures/flipbook_textures.json in resource packs.

tokens.text: defines animated textures that cycle through frames over time

note: This file is a JSON array at the root level, with each element being a flipbook texture definition.

subForm.title: Flipbook Texture Entry
subForm.description: Defines an animated texture with frame timing.

fields.title: Flipbook Texture
fields.description: Path to the texture file containing the animation frames, stacked vertically.

fields.title: Atlas Tile
fields.description: The name of the texture in the terrain or item atlas that this animation applies to.

fields.title: Atlas Index
fields.description: Index in the atlas for textures with variants. Used when a single atlas tile has multiple texture options.

fields.title: Ticks Per Frame
fields.description: Number of game ticks each frame is displayed before advancing to the next frame. 20 ticks = 1 second.

fields.title: Frames
fields.description: Optional array of frame indices to play in order. If not specified, frames play sequentially from top to bottom.

fields.title: Frame Index
fields.description: Index of the frame to display (0-based, from top of texture).

fields.title: Replicate
fields.description: How many times to replicate the texture frames. Used for multi-tile textures.

fields.title: Blend Frames
fields.description: If true, smoothly interpolates between frames. If false, frames switch instantly.
